title: Subchapter A - Labor Relations Board
content:
Subchapter A - Labor Relations Board

State Regulations

Part 250 - Definitions And General Provisions (§ 250.1 to 250.13)

Part 251 - Procedure under Section 705 Of Sera for Investigation and Certification of Representatives

Part 252 - Procedure under Section 706 Of Sera for Prevention of Unfair Labor Practices

Part 253 - GENERAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO ALL NON-FLFLPA PROCEEDINGS
Part 254 - Designation, Powers And Duties of Board's Agents for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 254.1 to 254.4)

Part 255 - Service of Papers (§ 255.1 to 255.3)

Part 256 - Certification and Signature Of Documents for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 256.1 to 256.2)

Part 257 - Conciliation for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 257.1 to 257.18)

Part 258 - Settlement of Labour Disputer Pursuant to Section 702-a for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 258.1 to 258.18)

Part 259 - Declaratory Rulings for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 259.1 to 259.2)

Part 260 - Access to records of the board for NON-FLFLPA Matters (§ 260.1 to 260.4)

Part 261 - MISCONDUCT BEFORE THE AGENCY FOR NON-FLFLPA MATTERS (§ 261.1 to 261.2)

Part 262 - PRIVACY PROTECTION AND ACCURACY OF PERSONAL DATA FOR NON-FLFLPA MATTERS (§ 262.1 to 262.9)

Part 263 - Rules Implementing the Farm Laborers' Fair Labor Practices Act ("FLFLPA")

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
